--- title: "Welcome To STATS141XP" subtitle: "Practice of Statistical Consulting" description: "Below are links used in this course" image: stats140xp.png about: template: trestles links: - text: Zoom url: "https://ucla.zoom.us/j/4285433918?pwd=TVpIRndYYmZSeTg0NUUvYlhTWllUQT09" icon: camera-video - text: Email url: "mailto:toledo60@g.ucla.edu" icon: inbox-fill - text: Campuswire url: "https://campuswire.com" icon: people comments: false --- ::: column-page ## Class Overview **Instructor:** Jose Toledo Luna **Office Hours**: Friday 12:00pm - 1:00pm
Both office hours and discussion will be held online through [Zoom](https://ucla.zoom.us/j/4285433918?pwd=TVpIRndYYmZSeTg0NUUvYlhTWllUQT09) ## Required Technology Make sure to sign up or download the following software *(in order)* 1. [LaTeX](https://www.latex-project.org/get/) 2. [Overleaf](https://www.overleaf.com): Online $\LaTeX$ editor 3. [R/R Studio](https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/) 4. [Quarto](https://quarto.org): An open-source scientific and technical publishing system 5. [CiteDrive](https://app.citedrive.com): Online reference manager which integrates well with Quarto and Overleaf 6. [Git](https://git-scm.com/downloads) and [Github](https://github.com): Version control We will get to this towards the end of the quarter 7. [Netlify](https://www.netlify.com): Website hosting service *(sign up using Github account)* ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ## Resources ### LaTeX Templates
Documment Template ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} \documentclass[11pt,letterpaper]{article} \usepackage[top=1in,bottom=1in,left=1in,right=1in]{geometry} \usepackage{amsmath,amsfonts,amssymb,amsthm, bm} \usepackage{indentfirst,setspace} \usepackage{graphicx} \usepackage{enumitem} \setlength\parindent{0pt} \renewcommand{\baselinestretch}{1.1} \begin{document} \begin{flushleft} NAME \hfill CLASS \rule{\textwidth}{.5pt} \end{flushleft} \end{document} ``` :::
[Presentation Template](https://www.overleaf.com/latex/templates/simpleplus-beamertheme/wfmfjhdcrdfx) ### Quarto [Quarto CV Template](https://github.com/mps9506/quarto-cv) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ## Schedule | **Date** | Recordings | |-------------------------|-----------------------------------------------| | Week 1 (1/10) | [Introduction, Installing Software](https://ucla.zoom.us/rec/share/MPUg4L6xX3uA6G3tmiaSZ0PFMBdAHBoxzM6681FQgH52F2h6UNtcwULDqBNlRqb-.sxcyH0Uo4wZ-SJgb) | | **Week 2 (1/17)** | [Intro to LaTeX](https://ucla.zoom.us/rec/share/tkUdRGTTeuL99eNX8VZoFdHbJ2p30HjMDpYTs5XLQ3ppTWI8VUmhlvlXpUsPnxMo.ioLfQQv7kS1LkBLQ) | | Week 3 (1/24) | [Referencing on LaTeX, CiteDrive, R Projects](https://ucla.zoom.us/rec/share/Jjpatc7CLNpisJ2wCCD0LsR5So3NXznjcPWPBKIt4JRFEmsLMp_3aYTM_COYHIyX.XSHAAkaHBZNLqBJ-) | | Week 4 (1/31) | [Setting up Git/Github for R Studio](https://ucla.zoom.us/rec/share/8qzl7jhK2jm2aAt4aR6IVngpDjIk1FhFNvi_FrQonz5HQZCYtaazBxkS8qwaRss._dutcJTTbi-Dmc1h) | | Week 5 (2/7) | [CV with Quarto](https://ucla.zoom.us/rec/share/sZSvm8pgvYkL1zGG3EyT7vXDPWpbX5sBXRpBji5Y6FTC7C9W1_aIuIKaSPRtSWgQ.-cDZWyLAIRKHbznc) | | Week 6 (2/14) | [Setting up Personal Website](https://ucla.zoom.us/rec/share/FCAjlayGSJ5fSn5oL_qjuYhdsBpWiNkip8yRenmAnlftnsipGuyGEnwrg-x0_yln.zT9eZMDluPe94CEr) | | **Week 7 (2/21)** | [Adding Content to Website](https://ucla.zoom.us/rec/share/JXP7N70ZucvY84cI5DyY1XFi0kYmbjR0BnkGGJvpgDsQRRkX1U65v4gN-94r0HX2.yeNIk7dPkga5Wd3v) | :::
